__e: Oh, Sergio, I was so unhappy, these two years, but now enough, enough.
I got him on the rebound, UncleJervis... - but I got him, and that's all that I care about.
No, my kids are in school now, I have to call them this evening, talk to them!
No. I haven't been down there... since he died, over twenty years ago.
You ordered the Count to kill Snow and Charming all those years ago, so now... that's exactly what he's going to do.
I said, oh, my cat did that two years ago.
Oh, so you are just coming back from your date, the one that wasn't supposed to shock your children.
Should we go down now and see what it's all about?
Have you no thought for that tiny life that even now is quickening inside you?
